text: Hitzkirch is a municipality in Hochdorf in the canton of Lucerne in Switzerland. On 1 January 2009, Gelfingen, Hämikon, Mosen, Müswangen, Retschwil and Sulz joined Hitzkirch. On 1 January 2021, Altwis became a part of Hitzkirch. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website of Hitzkirch * Category:Municipalities in Hochdorf
title: Hitzkirch
